member.name: M:semestralka_routing_simulation.Helpers.GetNextGaussian(System.UInt64,System.Random)
member.summary: Return a random ulong with Gaussian distribution (but discrete).

remarks.para: There is no choice for user to alter distributions parameters - mean and variance are hardcoded to maxTime / 2 and maxTime / 4 respectively. These parameters correspond to probability density being about 8 times greater in point maxTime / 2 compared to points at the ends of distribution, while still leaving only minimum of probability left for points out of bounds (ie smaller than 0 and bigger than maxTime.
Also, I wanted to use Poisson, but factorial doesn't make good friends with big numbers.
